DOC.brief_summary: This phase 1 , open-label , dose-escalation clinical trial evaluate safety SGN-75 patient CD70-positive relapsed refractory non-Hodgkin lymphoma metastatic renal cell carcinoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Dose-escalation Trial SGN-75 CD70-positive Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma Renal Cell Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Pathologicallyconfirmed diagnosis NHL RCC Relapsed , refractory , progressive disease follow least 1 prior systemic therapy Confirmed CD70 expression Measurable disease , define least 1 lesion > 1.5 cm great transverse diameter patient NHL , least 1 nonresectable tumor lesion > equal 10 mm diameter patient RCC Previously receive allogeneic transplant History another primary malignancy remission least 3 year Prior antiCD70directed therapy
